description:
Keep their feet cozy and warm on chilly days. Comfort is key when making the most of a snow day, the Camper Jr socks are thick and toasty, so they can focus on the import things, like sledding and snow forts.

  • Acrylic blend is super soft, wicks away moisture, and dries quickly
  • Extra support through the arch and ankles
  • Reinforced heels and toes add strength where it is needed most
  • Flat seams eliminate potential hot spots
  • All over cushioning provides all day comfort
name: Kombi Camper Socks - Children
